user_submissions.submission: groundkontroltech commented on The Uncanny X-Men (Pro) (Stern, 2024) at Ground Kontrol Classic Arcade in Portland. They said: Far left outlane rubber replaced, stuck ball issue fixed. We've been in communication with Stern about the plunger/autolaunch issue. Unfortunately it's problem with many Uncanny X-Men machines from the factory caused by the ball clattering in the orbit after launch. Stern is working on a fix and as soon as we get it we will install it.
user_submissions.comment: Far left outlane rubber replaced, stuck ball issue fixed. We've been in communication with Stern about the plunger/autolaunch issue. Unfortunately it's problem with many Uncanny X-Men machines from the factory caused by the ball clattering in the orbit after launch. Stern is working on a fix and as soon as we get it we will install it.

pbm commented on Godzilla (Pro) (Stern, 2021) at Ground Kontrol Classic Arcade in Portland. They said: mre - mellow out, this isn't a whitewashing comment. When GZ is set with the bubble in the middle, it is generally very floaty. Almost all Godzillas are set steeper than what the bubble suggests (bad bubble design?). The tech stated below that they use their own level for this machine. If it's too steep for your liking, ok, but maybe take it offline?
user_submissions.comment: mre - mellow out, this isn't a whitewashing comment. When GZ is set with the bubble in the middle, it is generally very floaty. Almost all Godzillas are set steeper than what the bubble suggests (bad bubble design?). The tech stated below that they use their own level for this machine. If it's too steep for your liking, ok, but maybe take it offline?

user_submissions.submission:
mre commented on Godzilla (Pro) (Stern, 2021) at Ground Kontrol Classic Arcade in Portland. They said: Operator is white washing comments, which is against pinball maps guidelines.

Just played a Godzilla Premium in Milwaukee's Blackbird Bar that is level and plays like butter.

"Tournament standard..." 😂
user_submissions.comment:
Operator is white washing comments, which is against pinball maps guidelines.

Just played a Godzilla Premium in Milwaukee's Blackbird Bar that is level and plays like butter.

"Tournament standard..." 😂

user_submissions.submission: groundkontroltech commented on Godzilla (Pro) (Stern, 2021) at Ground Kontrol Classic Arcade in Portland. They said: Our machines are set up to a tournament standard.
user_submissions.comment: Our machines are set up to a tournament standard.

user_submissions.submission: mre commented on Godzilla (Pro) (Stern, 2021) at Ground Kontrol Classic Arcade in Portland. They said: This machine, like all games I played there last night, was so far angled down on the front legs that playable was greatly affected. Hitting the left and right ramps was very difficult due to the extreme angle on the playfield, as verified by the built in level and experience playing at least 8 other Godzilla machines.
user_submissions.comment: This machine, like all games I played there last night, was so far angled down on the front legs that playable was greatly affected. Hitting the left and right ramps was very difficult due to the extreme angle on the playfield, as verified by the built in level and experience playing at least 8 other Godzilla machines.
